creditline: Gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council in celebration of its thirty-fourth anniversary
description: in the form of the chalice; removable inner round cover for paten, which fits underneath base of chalice; pink lining; brown leather exterior with gilt embossed scroll designs; silver hook closures
object_name: Case for Eucharistic chalice and paten
title: Case for Eucharistic chalice and paten
